block.title: Xray Frequency
block.text:
Xray Splunk runs a script that examines the configuration files and creates lookups. All searches in Xray Splunk are based on these lookups, so the script should be run periodically.
After installing the Xray Splunk app, wait for one interval to allow the initial run of the script to complete.

input.label: Specify the interval in seconds for script to run
